trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: You can breathe air and water, and have a swim speed of 40 ft.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
trait.text: You can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when you speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
trait.text: You have advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: Your long jump is up to 20 feet and your high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Bullywug.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on your turn, you can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack for 1d4+Strength piercing damage.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Gnoll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
trait.text: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Common and Goblin.

trait.name: Blind Senses
trait.text: You have blindsight out to 30 feet and are blind beyond that radius. If you are deafened, your blindsight radius is reduced to 10 feet. If you are deafened and unable to smell, you are unable to use your blindsight.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
trait.text: You have advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Undercommon.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
trait.text: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of yours that isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Common and Goblin.

trait.name: Ambusher
trait.text: You have advantage on attack rolls against any creature you have surprised.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: You can mimic any sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You understand Auran and Common but speak only through the use of your Mimicry trait.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) rolls that rely on sight.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak common and draconic.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: You can breathe air and water, and have a swim speed of 30 ft.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
trait.text: You can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of you that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. You can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
trait.text: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) rolls that rely on sight.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Undercommon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: You can hold your breath for 15 minutes. You also have a swim speed of 30 feet.

trait.name: Natural Armor
trait.text: You have a +3 bonus to your armor class due to your natural armor.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Draconic.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: You can breathe air and water, and have a swim speed of 40 ft.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Aquan and Common.

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Common and Orcish.

trait.name: Bludgeoning Vulnerability
trait.text: You are vulnerable to bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep. You are immune to poison damage and can't become exhausted or poisoned.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You understand all the languages you knew in life but cannot speak.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
trait.text: You have advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Stench
trait.text: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of you must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.
Poisoned:
• A poisoned creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) rolls that rely on sight.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

trait.name: Natural Armor
trait.text: You have a +1 bonus to your armor class due to your natural armor.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak Troglodyte.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
trait.text: If damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, you drop to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep. You are immune to poison damage and can't become poisoned.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You understand all the languages you knew in life but cannot speak.
